name: Squambers
description:
The goal is to escape each level by matching your square's number with the goal square's number. You do that by fusing with other squares of the same number thus doubling your number. The thing is you cannot fuse with another square on your own but instead you'll need the help of your friend/enemy to push squares into you for the squares to fuse. Beware of your friend/enemy because when he turns red he is deadly but friendly when he is green. Controls: -Use your Mouse and Left-Click to move. -Hold Alt or Shift  or Right-Click to use an alternate(different) pathMore info:

This game was meant for the Wowie jam 4, but I had some issues when trying to submit the game and missed the deadline.
